Class XmlConfigurationFactory

All Implemented Interfaces:
URIConfigurationFactory
@Namespace("ConfigurationFactory") @Plugin("XmlConfigurationFactory") public class XmlConfigurationFactory extends ConfigurationFactory
Factory to construct an XmlConfiguration.
